title: FEC's 2000 Annual Report Available
html:
June 4, 2001

 

 

 

Advisory to Daybook Editors, Correspondents, Broadcasters:

Copies of the Federal Election Commission’s Annual Report 2000 are available through the FEC Press Office. Among other highlights, the report chronicles calendar year 2000, profiles legal issues, details legislative recommendations, describes Administrative Fine and Alternative Dispute Resolution programs, and contains numerous charts and graphs on campaign finance activity. The Annual Report is also on the FEC Website (www.fec.gov).
